resources.string: Start typing to filter the list...

StudentVoice enables prospective and current university students to locate Universities, their local attractions and view public reviews about them. Currently, only London is supported.


This is our first attempt at software development. Created during CDI Europeâ€™s pilot Apps For Good course and guided by Antony Marcano of RiverGlide, this was implemented in 3 hours a day over 3 weeks (so far). Our future vision includes writing your own reviews, social network integration and coverage of all UK universities.


talktous@studentvoiceonline.co.uk

 - Carlos Mateus - Moses Sonson - Matthew Tanti -
